features: ☀Dimmable Ring Light: The LED ring light is a Circle Light with a diameter of 10 inches. The ring light for iPhone has built-in 120 bright LED lights, and the LED ring light with stand has 3 color lighting modes (white, warm yellow, warm white), the color temperature is 2900K-5700K, each color lighting mode has 10 brightness adjustments for your choices, meet all your needs

☀Stable and Adjustable Tripod: The tripod with ring light is made of ABS and carbon steel to achieve better support. The bottom of the tripod can be extended to 19.3 inches, which can provide better stability. The length of the ring light support rod can be extended from 13.8 inches to 63 inches. The LED ring light with adjustable tripod can meet your needs for any height. In addition, the tripod with ring light can also be used as a selfie stick and selfie phone tripod

☀Flexible Mobile Phone Holder: The two mobile phone holders of the circle light with tripod belt are very flexible, you can rotate it 360 degrees to adjust the angle, and the mobile phone holder can be expanded to 3.5 inches, which is compatible with almost all smartphones. There is a large enough ring light of phone, you can put the phone in the middle of the LED ring light to get 360 degree soft light without dead angle

☀Supports USB Charging: You can connect the USB charging cable that comes with the LED selfie ring light to the power bank, laptop, PC , USB charger and any device with a USB interface for charging. There are four buttons on the power cord of the ring light, which are used to turn on/off the power, switch the lighting mode and adjust the brightness level, as well as the Bluetooth Selfie remote control provided by us to make your use the ring light for iphone more convenient and faster

☀Comprehensive Warranty Service: In order to provide you with high-quality LED ring lights and services, each of our ring lights has undergone strict quality inspection, if you are not satisfied with the ring light with stand, please contact us anytime, we provide a 30-day no-reason refund and a one-year quality guarantee. Buy and use our ring light with tripod without any worries

Ring Lights for Live Streaming For streamers of all kinds, ring lighting solutions are a popular and affordable way to personalize a stream while making your visual quality rise substantially. Ring Light for Zoom Conferencing Ring lights are good for Zoom calls because they highlight your face rather than the background. They provide warm light to enhance the appearance of your eyes and facial structure. Ring Light for Taking Photos Ring lights are popular in photography. In addition to overall studio lighting, a professional photographer or videographer may use a ring lights to ensure subjects are evenly illuminated by soft light. Ring Light for Makeup A ring light lets you bring the same universally gorgeous lighting into your home. The ring lights for makeup let you work with different lighting temperatures just like the professionals do, resulting in flawless looks.

A ring light features a number of small bulbs forming a circle. When used in photography, it creates an attractive catch light on a subject's eyes. Everyone can use the ring light with stand and phone holder to make every moment of your life more memorable. Don't miss the beauty the selfie light ring for iphone brings to you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Buy, easy setup!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a beginner and with the full intention of passing it down to my tween daughter. This ring light is amazing and still running strong for over a year now. There’s a few attachments that I still haven’t needed to use. I love the 3 light modes and iOS/Android compatibility. The extendable tripod stand is great for counter/desk use and on floor. I only wish it was sturdier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Intro ring light with tripod stand and 1/4" threads
reviews.reviewText: As a novice photographer this provides a way to control lighting via a led ring light which attaches to a coupler and then to the tripod stand, allowing for tilt and 360 degree adjustment. It has a variety of attachments for a mobile phone camera. These have springs inside which recoil the clamp after being fitted with a mobile phone camera. These attachments vary in an effort to provide flexibility in camera positioning. The stand itself is extendable and each telescoping section locks with a simple 1/8 (or so) twist. The collapsible tripod is about 13" vertically. The telescoping part screws into the base tripod.left side uses light box lighting. Right side uses the ring light (notice it is not in the picture).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good, user-friendly light ring with plenty of accessories
reviews.reviewText: I got this light ring because of its cost--it's a very inexpensive option for me, as I tend to do one to two Zoom calls a week. It's easy to use, right out of the box. Within minutes of getting it, I had the tripod set up. It's user-friendly: a twist at the joint and the stand extends to the height you need.The light ring easily screwed on to the tripod. You will need an adapter if you're plugging it into a wall outlet that doesn't have a USB port, but once it was plugged it, it worked perfectly. The attached picture shows the ring on its brightest setting. The light is brilliant, and sufficient to bring out facial features while on a call.Once my daughters saw it was set up, they borrowed it for a school Teams meeting. Their call lasted two solid hours, with no issue. The tripod stayed extended the whole time with no issue, and the light stayed at its full intensity with no problem. GREAT!We haven't tried the accessories yet, and look forward to it. There are several holders for cell phones to plug right into the center of the light ring. We haven't tried putting a heavy camera on the tripod (the light ring is very light weight). It's a good product, and you can't beat the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Enhance Your Content: A Quick Review of the LED Selfie Ring Light with Stand
reviews.reviewText: The LED Selfie Ring Light with Stand is a versatile lighting solution that brings a professional touch to your photography, videos, makeup application, and live streams. With its adjustable tripod stand and convenient phone holder, this compact ring light offers a range of features that make it an essential tool for content creators, vloggers, and beauty enthusiasts.Featuring a sleek circular design, the ring light utilizes energy-efficient LED bulbs to provide consistent and flicker-free illumination. You can easily adjust the brightness and color temperature settings to achieve the perfect lighting for any environment or mood. The result is soft, even lighting that enhances the clarity and detail of your subject.Setting up the LED Selfie Ring Light with Stand is a breeze. The sturdy tripod stand ensures stability during use, and the phone holder securely holds your device, allowing for hands-free operation. Whether you're using it on a desktop or floor, the adjustable height and angle offer flexibility in capturing the ideal shot or video.In terms of value for money, this ring light is a smart investment. It serves as an all-in-one lighting solution, eliminating the need for multiple setups. With its professional-grade lighting capabilities, versatility, and user-friendly design, it offers exceptional performance at an affordable price.In conclusion, the LED Selfie Ring Light with Stand is a reliable and convenient tool for enhancing your content. Whether you're a content creator, vlogger, or beauty enthusiast, this ring light provides the perfect lighting for various applications. Elevate your photography, videos, makeup application, and live streams with this powerful and compact ring light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Ring Light for a Budget
reviews.reviewText: Ring light is great, loved that it came with the Bluetooth remote.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Tripod fell and broke my phone
reviews.reviewText: I have a Pixel 7 pro. This device struggles to hold the weight of my phone.I had everything tightened as much as possible and it was still struggling to hold my phone up and maintain a position. The light kept tipping forward and moving the camera angle.The brackets that hold your phone are flimsy and not strong enough, nor wide enough to hold a phone with a protective case around it.In order to try to get my phone to stay in the bracket, I took the protective case off. Bad choice. The tripod has a very poor locking mechanism (you have to twist it to prevent it from going up and down and it easily untwists while you're trying to adjust your camera angle).Long story short, I was trying to manipulate the light and camera and ended up accidentally twisting the center pole which made the tripod collapse in on itself. It dropped my phone and now my brand new Pixel 7 pro screen is destroyed.I like all the features that come with this, but it's not high quality. I create cooking videos and it's not great for a direct down angle on something you're working on. Better for filming something face to face or cross the room because of the angles. The feet on the tripod make it difficult to position the camera if you're using it up against a counter.I could not get the Bluetooth remote to work with my phone at all. I tried everything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: HOW DO I PUT THIS TOGETHER?
reviews.reviewText: no instructions with this product i have never used one of these halo lights before i will work it out but please include instructions .i bought the halo light to help give jewellery look better when im selling and im now going to have to work out how to put the halo light together oh joy!
